TopicTitle: Numerical readout for Rep at KSC

Articles.Content:
So when looking at the KSC you can easily tell your cash and science but when looking at Rep you see an analogue thingy which makes it hard to tell how much rep you actually have. If there are markings on it they are not visible to me under normal gameplay situations.

When using admin building policies some of them require specific amounts of Rep to activate and it is a pain to have to get to the point of selecting one of them before you can find out exactly how much Rep you have.

My suggestion is to have a numerical readout for Rep visible from the KSC screen by default which is as easily read as the other two readouts.

Also, while there an extra digit on the funds readout...

Apologies if this is a repeat request, I had a check but could not find it suggested.
